GSD.product_version: versions from v5.11 to before v5.15.46
GSD.description:
regulator: scmi: Fix refcount leak in scmi_regulator_probe

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.46 by commit 9ebbfa73d69909b7c737f599fd4ebd42318fc881, it was introduced in version v5.11 by commit 0fbeae70ee7ce98e18a47337cd1f205dd88589e9. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: regulator: scmi: Fix refcount leak in scmi_regulator_probe
